name: Animal Puzzles for Toddlers (itch)
description:
• Toddler puzzles are proven to boost baby creativity, focus, memory, abstract thinking, fine body coordination and mental speed in a natural and safe way.
  • Very easy and intuitive to use, your little child will learn by himself with drag and drop gestures, with a bit of help of parent/tutor at first, toddlers will know how to solve the rest! keeps them busy in a smart way.
  • Enless entertainment, fun and education at home with parents, playroom with nanny or preschool with nurse!
  • Designed for babies, toddlers, preschool and kindergarten children, boys and girls
  • Always proper, decent and respectful content for kids, no social network links and ad-free (really, no ads at all).
  • Adorable high quality cartoon graphics and music
